pkgmetadata.longdescription: LiDAR Data Voxelisation // Read, manipulate and write voxel spaces. Voxel spaces are read from text-based output files of the 'AMAPVox' software. 'AMAPVox' is a LiDAR point cloud voxelisation software that aims at estimating leaf area through several theoretical/numerical approaches. See more in the article Vincent et al. (2017) doi:10.23708/1AJNMP and the technical note Vincent et al. (2021) doi:10.23708/1AJNMP.
